before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"61s8l","text":"For this protocol you will need:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7i2gg","text":"- a Beckman-Coulter Biomek FX liquid handler system with a 96-pod head","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7jdph","text":"- Upload the attached method file and modify it to fit your deck and system configuration","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9v6d3","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"i67g","text":"- an Eppendorf 5810R centrifuge with S-4-104 rotor or similar centrifuge","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"35rb9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"de1av","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"70v5r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"file","mutability":"","data":{"forceSelection":true,"guid":"0C115FC017FE11EC8E9779CC556B3482","id":135310,"nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"Modular Protein Extraction method.bmf","placeholder":"","raw_source":"","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/eeeqbdbyp.bmf"}}}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"fsjg0","text":"This protocol details steps to extract protein from Gram-negative bacterial or fungal cells (that have been pretreated with zymolyase) in quantitative proteomic workflows by using a Biomek FX liquid handler system. It is a semi-automated protocol that includes several 'pause' steps for centrifugation steps that are conducted manually \"off-deck\".","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3frpq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b2316","text":"This protocol works best as part of an automated proteomic sample preparation workflow with:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"c9a0r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9nb1u","text":"Automated Protein Quantitation with the Biomek-FX liquid handler system","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":71}],"data":[]},{"key":"8411a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"c91k2","text":"and","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bplrc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5nj5g","text":"Automated Protein Normalization and Tryptic Digestion on a Biomek-NX Liquid Handler System","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":90}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"E8B5E5A0BD8F11EBBEC7BFBF2E99404B","url":"https://www.protocols.io/view/automated-protein-quantitation-with-the-biomek-fx-bsyynfxw"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"0CC06DD0BD9011EBBEC7BFBF2E99404B","url":"https://www.protocols.io/view/automated-protein-normalization-and-tryptic-digest-buypnxvn"}}}}

forks.title: Automated Chloroform-Methanol Protein Extraction on the Biomek-FX Liquid Handler System

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"1sno0","text":"- A Beckman-Coulter Biomek FX liquid handler system is used for this protocol. Alternative liquid handlers can be used with appropriate method development.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"e9382","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"70a73","text":"- Because different deck orientations and system components are possible, you will need to modify the method file (attached in the 'Before start' section) for your specific Biomek liquid handler system.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3n4aa","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fmf1m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7sdfp","text":"Open Biomek Software that controls Biomek-FX liquid handler system. Under \"File\" drop-down, click \"Open\" to select the automation method \"Modular Protein Extraction method.\"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fh10f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ca98","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3ou7d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"c2sjb","text":"Because different deck orientations and system components are possible, you will need to modify the method file (attached in the 'Before start' section) for your specific Biomek liquid handler system.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"216r0","text":"Put PCR96 plate back on deck space (refer to deck setup picture above) -- PCR96 plate \"prot.\"  Swirl and pour solvent (4:1, Methanol:Chloroform) into reservoir.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"hnqn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fta60","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dmkvc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8e7e8","text":"Note: It is important to swirl the Methanol:Chloroform mixture at this step to ensure it is well mixed. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"19afn","text":"Remove supernatant by transferring 87 µl from PCR96 plate back to cell plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d7sfl","text":"Transfer 125 µl of solvent (4:1, Methanol:Chloroform) to PCR96 plate. Mix to promote cell lysis with 20 cycles of pipetting mixing on deck. {"blocks":[{"key":"ejrg1","text":"Remove supernatant by transferring 170 µl of top layer from PCR96 plate to cell plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dbkra","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aak0q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2vo99","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6ek5k","text":"Add 75 µl of methanol and mix with 20 cycles of pipetting mixing on deck.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2rj5a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ff3be","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7oqq2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8qael","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"29scj","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1d03l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8acju","text":"Note: The number of pipetting cycles is a user defined variable in the Biomek method that can be changed as needed.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"DF667DD0173E11EC9E75399BF98DC75B","height":231,"id":199591,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"Screen Shot 2021-09-16 at 1.15.20 PM.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gc7jbdbyp.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gc7hbdbyp.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gc7ibdbyp.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gc7gbdbyp.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"in7m","text":"The PAUSE step prompts you to centrifuge your PCR96 plate.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"epsu4","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"darbp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"csihp","text":"Before you centrifuge, visualize your plate to make sure the Chloroform layer has mixed well with added Methanol. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e60oc","text":"Centrifuge   .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":11,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"","data":{"centrifuge":"4000","duration":120,"guid":"A702A47C1FB011EB96D30A58A9FEAC2A","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null,"temperature":"25","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7ikoe","text":"Put PCR96 plate back on deck space (refer to deck setup picture above) -- PCR96 plate \"prot.\"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b4kib","text":"Remove supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

Samples are typically cloudy in this step. After trypsin digestion they will be nearly clear.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"cpsg3","text":"           2. Inspecting samples after method finishes in case chunks of protein may present in samples of large protein pellets, Mixing with multichannel pipette may be necessary.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8uv5n","text":"           3. Users can increase or decrease resuspension volume as needed.   ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"d2b47","text":"Wear proper PPE (gloves, safety goggles, and lab coat), and prepare solvents in a chemical fume hood.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"aqlrg","text":"Store organic solvents in a flammable storage cabinet when not in use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bd1o","text":"Discard used solvents and buffers in appropriate waste containers.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
